popular.name: Basic Party Package
popular.description: 1 13'X13' jumper, 3 6' kid's tables, 24 kids chairs, and 12 balloons.

backyard.name: Margarita Memories
backyard.description: Includes: 2 sigle bowl margarita machines, 2 frozen margarita flavors, 100 9oz. tumblers, and 1 margarita salt rimmer.

backyard.name: Basic Party Package 2
backyard.description: Includes: one 4 in 1 combo, 3 6' tables, 24 white samsonite chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

backyard.name: Helium Birthday Balloon Bouquet
backyard.description: Includes: 6 11 in printed helium balloons and 2 mylar 18 in balloons. The perfect surprise for any birthday!

backyard.name: Helium Balloon Bouquet (6 per)
backyard.description: 6 Helium balloons with weight. Comes in various colors. Perfect as decorations or gifts.

backyard.name: Cotton Candy Package
backyard.description: Includes: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper and 1 cotton candy machine with 100 servings.

corporate.name: Balloon Party 2
corporate.description: Includes: 1 helium tank 110CF., 200 latex balloons 11', 1 ribbon roll 350yd., and 1 tilt helium adaptor.

corporate.name: Helium Balloons, Printed
corporate.description: 11 inch printed balloons. Available in a variety of colors. Custom printing is available.

corporate.name: Helium Balloon Bouquet (12 per)
corporate.description: 12 Helium Balloons with weight. These are 11in balloons and are available in a variety of colors.

corporate.name: Balloon Colums 7'
corporate.description: 7' high colums with giant balloon on top.

carnival.name: Popcorn Party Package
carnival.description: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper and 1 popcorn machine with 100 servings, this includes popcorn, butter, and decorated popcorn paper bags.

carnival.name: Snowcone Package
carnival.description: Includes: 1 13' x 13' jumper, 1 snow cone machine, 3 syrup flavors, 100 spoon straws, and 100 snow cone cones. PLEASE NOTE: ice is not included.

carnival.name: Cotton Candy Dreams
carnival.description: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper, 1 cotton candy machine with 100 servings, 3 6' children's tables, 24 children's chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

carnival.name: Balloon Party 1
carnival.description: Includes: 1 55cf helium tank, 75 balloons, 1 balloon ribbon roll, and 1 helium tilt adaptor.

carnival.name: Helium Balloon Bouquet (10 Per)
carnival.description: 10 Helium balloons with weight. These are 11in balloons and are available in a variety of colors.
